div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 656 Sfintesti, 35 km. NNW of Alexandria, Rumania, c. 1942 Burial: after 72 B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: 106 AR Thasos: 13 spread-flan tetradr. incl. imit. Roman Rep.: 93 den. incl. 1 imit. Disposition: Bucharest (Inst. Arch.) Stefan, Dacia 1941-4, pp. 349-57, illus. (Butcu- lesti hd.) Mitrea, Materials archeologice privind istoria veche 1953, pp. 507-22, illus.
